traits.name: Burst Swimmer
traits.desc: When this creature is using its swim speed, it doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.

traits.name: Acid Spit
traits.desc: +5 to hit, range 20 ft., one target. Hit: Ongoing 5 (1d6 + 2) acid damage (DC 10 Reflex saving throw).

traits.name: Name Taker
traits.desc: Range 40, The target must succeed on a DC 12 Int saving throw or forget his name and goals. The target takes (8) 1d10+3 psychic damage (or half on a successful save) and is unable to use any class feature beside single basic attacks and cantrips. They may retry the saving throw at the end of every round.

traits.name: Acidic Shower
traits.desc: The creatures throws a sphere of acid that explodes into a 10 ft radius sphere of acid  within 30 ft. Anyone that starts its turn or moves for the first time each turn in this zone must pass a DC 12 Dex saving throw or take ongoing 5 (1d6+2) acid damage. The zone stays until the death of the creature or until he uses this ability again.
